Home » 31Dht Dhātukathāpāḷi » 2 Niddesa
2.12 Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
417.
513Vedanākkhandhena ye dhammā…  saññākkhandhena ye dhammā…  saṅkhārakkhandhena ye dhammā sampayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā? Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
418.
514Viññāṇakkhandhena ye dhammā…  manāyatanena ye dhammā…  cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā ye dhammā…pe…  manodhātuyā ye dhammā…  manoviññāṇadhātuyā ye dhammā sampayuttā…pe…  te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
419.
515Samudayasaccena ye dhammā…  maggasaccena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
420.
516Manindriyena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
421.
517Sukhindriyena ye dhammā…  dukkhindriyena ye dhammā…  somanassindriyena ye dhammā…  domanassindriyena ye dhammā sampayuttā… , te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
422.
518Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
423.
519Saddhindriyena ye dhammā…  vīriyindriyena ye dhammā…  satindriyena ye dhammā…  samādhindriyena ye dhammā…  paññindriyena ye dhammā…  anaññātaññassāmītindriyena ye dhammā…  aññindriyena ye dhammā…  aññātāvindriyena ye dhammā…  avijjāya ye dhammā…  avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārehi ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
424.
520Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
425.
521Saḷāyatanapaccayā phassena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
426.
522Phassapaccayā vedanāya ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
427.
523Vedanāpaccayā taṇhāya ye dhammā…  taṇhāpaccayā upādānena ye dhammā…  kammabhavena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
428.
524Sokena ye dhammā…  dukkhena ye dhammā…  domanassena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
429.
525Upāyāsena ye dhammā…  satipaṭṭhānena ye dhammā…  sammappadhānena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
430.
526Iddhipādena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
431.
527Jhānena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
432.
528Appamaññāya ye dhammā…  pañcahi indriyehi ye dhammā…  pañcahi balehi ye dhammā…  sattahi bojjhaṅgehi ye dhammā…  ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
433.
529Phassena ye dhammā…  cetanāya ye dhammā…  manasikārena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
434.
530Vedanāya ye dhammā…  saññāya ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
435.
531Cittena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
Niddesa
Dvādasamanaya Sampayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddesa
436.
532Adhimokkhena ye dhammā sampayuttā…  te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

  • 2.12.2 Duka
